intent_atoms.description: Integrate ResearchLogMonitor audit results into SwiftUI previews
ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots must execute ResearchLogMonitor.audit against VR-006 fixtures and wire diagnostics into ResearchLogAuditPreview preview states
Missing fixture and schema mismatch states in the preview-only audit flows must expose NestedA11yIDs identifiers as asserted by ResearchLogAccessibilityIdentifierTests
ResearchLogMonitor.audit must always be executed when snapshots are taken for VR-006 fixtures

functional_units.name: ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots execution
functional_units.description: Executes ResearchLogMonitor.audit against VR-006 fixtures and provides snapshot data for SwiftUI previews.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogAuditPreview preview states
functional_units.description: Wires diagnostics into preview states to display audit results in SwiftUI previews.

functional_units.name: NestedA11yIDs identifier exposure
functional_units.description: Exposes NestedA11yIDs identifiers when missing fixture or schema mismatch states occur during preview-only audit flows.

functional_units.name: DocC guidance update
functional_units.description: Updates documentation and PRD trackers to highlight the SwiftUI preview audit workflow.
